room_title: Escape room "Room 2217" by Cubic Escape Room in San Jose
review: Played with 5 other friends in Room 2217. I would say this was by far the best escape room I have experienced. Most escape rooms focused on the puzzle and required a good understanding of American culture, they were kind of too hard for people from non-English speaking countries. While Room 2217 gave us a totally different experience via a story, it was so real. The ending was really out of expectation. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Room 2217" by Cubic Escape Room in San Jose
review: VERY well designed themed stories! I went with 6 friends to the "room 2217" and had really good time~ Good for family and friends to solve interesting problems together.

room_title: Escape room "Room 2217" by Cubic Escape Room in San Jose
review: Very good experience. We chose room 2217 and it's well-designed and interesting. We managed to escape in time and had a good time overall. The facilities and service are also very good.
